TestStep.Description: Initialisation of a General Purpose Input Output. PREREQUISITES: Android: Device-side script not yet created. Windows: Device-side script not yet created. Linux: This requires init_gpio.sh to be installed on the system.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: GPIO_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: Numero of the GPIO to set

Parameter.name: DIRECTION
Parameter.Description: The direction to set on the GPIO

TestStep.Description: Set the direction of a General Purpose Input Output. PREREQUISITES: Android: Device-side script not yet created. Windows: Device-side script not yet created. Linux: This requires set_gpio.sh to be installed on the system.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: GPIO_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: Numero of the GPIO to set

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Set the direction of a General Purpose Input Output. PREREQUISITES: Android: Device-side script not yet created. Windows: Device-side script not yet created. Linux: This requires set_gpio.sh to be installed on the system.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: GPIO_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: Numero of the GPIO to set

Parameter.name: DIRECTION
Parameter.Description: The direction to set on the GPIO

TestStep.Description: Set the Value of a General Purpose Input Output. PREREQUISITES: Android: Device-side script not yet created. Windows: Device-side script not yet created. Linux: This requires set_gpio.sh to be installed on the system.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: GPIO_NUMBER
Parameter.Description: Numero of the GPIO to set

Parameter.name: VALUE
Parameter.Description: The value applied to the GPIO

TestStep.Description: Set the direction of a General Purpose Input Output. PREREQUISITES: Android: Device-side script not yet created. Windows: Device-side script not yet created. Linux: This requires set_gpio.sh to be installed on the system.
